name: Tooltip
description: An informational tooltip component shown on hover or focus with configurable delays

accessibility.screenReader: Tooltip content is connected via aria-describedby. Announced when trigger receives focus.
knownLimitations: Content must be text-only for proper screen reader support

recommendedUsage: Use for brief, supplementary descriptions. Keep content concise and text-only.
antiPatterns: Do not use for essential information. Do not include interactive elements. Do not use for form validation.
